author: marioevz
content:
Hey folks, just a heads up that the `iat` deadline of the jwt in hive tests is being updated in this PR: https://github.com/ethereum/hive/pull/614
According to the latest change of the specs to 60 seconds.
So tests might start failing if the client has not updated yet

author: obone1
content: Hey all - does anyone have a good guide for setting up Geth-Lighthouse node on Goerli?

author: yorickdowne
content: Keep in mind Geth hasn't released a merge-ready client yet. Use an override TTD for now, or wait for the next Geth release

author: ravensslayer
content: clients will be out before friday?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Yes, releases will be out by tomorrow, wednesday latest
